author: Erin Donaghue
title: Chicago cop dies as coronavirus takes toll on forces nationwide
description: Departments across the country struggle to fill in for sick officers; some are seeing deaths within their ranks.
content: A highly decorated Chicago police officer has died of coronavirus, becoming the department's first virus-related death as police across the country grapple with the pandemic. Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot on Thursday announced the death of 50-year-old Marco Di… [+4769 chars]
